Message.Title: Android is Malware central!
Message.Msg: A newly discovered flaw in Google's Android security model enables rogue apps to gain full access to the Android system and all installed apps, read all data on the device, harvest passwords and create a botnet of "always-on, always-connected and always-moving" spy devices tracking users' location while secretly recording.

Message.Title: Very Large Gains Ahead
Message.Msg: CCUR is just $7.44 per share and has only 8.754mm s/o, a market cap of $65.13mm, cash of $22.37mm, no debt, and an enterprise value of $42.76mm. CCUR's enterprise value is only 0.68X revenues of $63.23mm, 6X operating cash flow of $7.13mm, and 7.64X free cash flow of $5.6mm. CCUR's EPS was up 175% last quarter and it just raised its dividend by 100% to $0.48 per share for a yield of 6.45%. CCUR leads of some of the world's hottest technology spaces! CCUR leads the video on demand (VOD) delivery business with over 2.4mm VOD streams deployed worldwide and 4 of America's 6 largest cable TV operators as clients. The #2 VOD tech vendor Seachange (SEAC) finished yesterday at $11.83 and is close to breaking its 52-week high of $12.10. SEAC has an enterprise value of $273.2mm or 1.75X revenues of $156.11mm, 15.67X operating cash flow of $17.43mm, and 20.12X free cash flow of $13.58mm. An enterprise value of 1.75X revenues would value CCUR at $15.20. An enterprise value of 15.67X operating cash flow will value CCUR at $15.32. An enterprise value of 20.12X free cash flow will value CCUR at $15.43. CCUR also provides the leading Big Data Analytics software solutions being utilized by cavke TV operators. CCUR tracks the behavior of 35 million cable TV subscribers and has already processed 15 billion transactions. Big Data Analytics is the #1 hottest tech space on Wall Street. Tableau Software (DATA) recently had its IPO at $31 and hit a new 52-week high yesterday of $61.45 for a gain of 98%. DATA's enterprise value is currently 24X revenues vs. CCUR's enterprise value of 0.68X revenues! CCUR's business is booming as pay-TV operators upgrade their systems to provide new Network DVR, start-over, and look-back services. CCUR is also powering multi-screen services by delivering video to tablets and smartphones for major cable TV operators like Time Warner Cable! Plus, CCUR offers leading content delivery network (CDN) solutions and just signed a huge CDN deal with Virgin Media!
